definition: abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

pinyin: Ai1 sai4 e2 bi3 ya4 jie4
Ai1 sai1 e2 bi3 ya4 yu3

sentences.english: The only oasis of life was in the highlands of Ethiopia.
sentences.chinese: 生命的唯一绿洲在埃塞俄比亚高原。

sentences.english: I could also have Italian, or Ethiopian.
sentences.chinese: 我也可以吃意大利菜或埃塞俄比亚菜。
麦拉库来自埃塞俄比亚。

sentences.english: The company is full of confidence in the investment environment in Ethiopia.
sentences.chinese: 经理部对埃塞俄比亚的投资环境充满了信心。

sentences.english: Mocha coffee was grown in Ethiopia of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 摩卡咖啡生长于非洲的埃塞俄比亚。

sentences.english: But other African countries have accused the Ethiopian leader of a sellout.
sentences.chinese: 但是，其它非洲国家指责埃塞俄比亚领导人背叛。

sentences.english: Meles reiterated that Ethiopia will resolutely uphold the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 梅莱斯重申埃塞俄比亚将坚定地奉行一个中国政策。

sentences.english: Ethiopia says it is committed to the withdrawal plans.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞俄比亚表示决心执行撤军计划。

sentences.english: Sub-Saharan Africa and Ethiopia remain the most chronically underfed regions.
sentences.chinese: 下撒哈拉非洲和埃塞俄比亚成为长期持续饥荒地区。

sentences.english: In Greek mythology, Cepheus represents a King of Ethiopia.
sentences.chinese: 在希腊神话中，仙王座象征着埃塞俄比亚的国王。

sentences.english: One discovery was of an earlier species of Ardipithecus from elsewhere in Ethiopia.
sentences.chinese: 一项发现是埃塞俄比亚其它地区的一个早期猿种。

sentences.english: Semitic language that is the official language of Ethiopia.
sentences.chinese: 说北埃塞俄比亚语的闪族人。

sentences.english: Melaku is going to visit some Ethiopian friends out of town…
sentences.chinese: 麦拉库会离开这里，看望他的一些埃塞俄比亚朋友。

sentences.english: Today Gona in Ethiopia is a place of climatic extremes.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞俄比亚戈纳地区现在的气候酷热无比。

sentences.english: But losing the coastline has not scuppered Ethiopia's merchant fleet.
sentences.chinese: 失去海岸线并未使埃塞俄比亚的商船队遭到重创。

sentences.english: East is derived from the Ethiopian highlands, Lake Tana, known as the Blue Nile.
sentences.chinese: 东源出自埃塞俄比亚高原的塔纳湖，称为青尼罗河。

definition: Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]

pinyin: Ya4 di4 si1 Ya4 bei4 ba1
